blog.name: lovelyharrystories
blog.title: lovelyharrystories
blog.description: Emma. 20. Something I do for fun! Request are closed. Updating schedule. and I also have a Masterlist

summary: a concept of harry attending y/n's show would be cute <3
question: a concept of harry attending y/n's show would be cute <3
answer:
Oh yes it would be!

Maybe you guys are just starting to date (no official relationship yet), having met each other like maybe a month ago at an award show and really hitting it off.

So since Harry is on his break and you having a show in London, he decided to come and see the show.

You are in your dressing room, an hour before the show starts and your manager walks in telling you that she just saw Harry walking into the arena in the VIP section.

You couldn’t believe your ears so you took your phone and texted Harry. Him replying that he was indeed at your show.

This made you freak out so much because you really liked him and wanted to impress him.

During your whole performance you were nervous and you really wished Harry liked it.

So when he showed up backstage with a big smile on his face, your nerves vanished immediately.  He wraps his long arms around your waist and whispers ‘You were amazing YN!’

‘You freaked me out coming over unannounced!’ You said and slapped his arm playfully.

‘Thought it would be a nice surprise.’ He says.

‘It was! I am really happy you are here.’ You say and give him a peck on his lips.

‘How about you take a shower and then we go have a late dinner?’ Harry asked.

You nodded and went to take a shower. The dinner was amazing. Harry couldn’t stop talking about how much he enjoyed the show and how amazing it was to see your fans dancing and singing along to your songs.

You said goodbye after dinner because you had to wake up early the next morning to do some radio shows.

The next day when you open your instagram you see that you are tagged in a picture of Harry at your show and you couldn’t help but feel butterflies in your stomach.

_______________

Request are open!

title: God Of Hell
body:
It hurts to love you, but I still love you. It’s just the way I feel. And I’d be lying if I kept hiding the fact that I can’t deal. And that I’ve been dying for something real​​.

Chapter Ten;

Diana smiles at Lucy. The man with the grey hair starts to speak again; Lucy presumes that it’s Zeus. The way he carries himself and he has the biggest throne out of all. Lucy looks at everyone and…

Read more…
